title: [ILO Webster]
creator_credit: Bert Kroon, John van der Heulen and Toonder Studios
brief_description: Unless we all work together the great problems of over population and massive unemployment has little chance of being overcome. This animated film discusses the problems and suggests possible ways of tackling them.
creator_credit_for_label: Bert Kroon, John van der Heulen and Toonder Studios
